mapper.select: select id, coupon_id, create_time, use_state, user_id, user_name, coupon_title, start_time, end_time, order_id, price, condition_price from coupon_record where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into coupon_record(coupon_id, create_time, use_state, user_id, user_name, coupon_title, start_time, end_time, order_id, price, condition_price) values (#{couponId}, #{createTime}, #{useState}, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{couponTitle}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{orderId}, #{price}, #{conditionPrice})

insert into coupon_record(coupon_id, create_time, use_state, user_id, user_name, coupon_title, start_time, end_time, order_id, price, condition_price) values
(#{entity.couponId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.useState}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.userName}, #{entity.couponTitle}, #{entity.startTime}, #{entity.endTime}, #{entity.orderId}, #{entity.price}, #{entity.conditionPrice})

insert into coupon_record(coupon_id, create_time, use_state, user_id, user_name, coupon_title, start_time, end_time, order_id, price, condition_price) values
(#{entity.couponId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.useState}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.userName}, #{entity.couponTitle}, #{entity.startTime}, #{entity.endTime}, #{entity.orderId}, #{entity.price}, #{entity.conditionPrice})
on duplicate key update coupon_id = values(coupon_id), create_time = values(create_time), use_state = values(use_state), user_id = values(user_id), user_name = values(user_name), coupon_title = values(coupon_title), start_time = values(start_time), end_time = values(end_time), order_id = values(order_id), price = values(price), condition_price = values(condition_price)
mapper.update:
update coupon_record
coupon_id = #{couponId},
create_time = #{createTime},
use_state = #{useState},
user_id = #{userId},
user_name = #{userName},
coupon_title = #{couponTitle},
start_time = #{startTime},
end_time = #{endTime},
order_id = #{orderId},
price = #{price},
condition_price = #{conditionPrice},
where id = #{id}
